title: Hilton Amenities for Your Next Spiritual Journey
author: Antonio Laguna
description: For travelers wanting to focus on spiritual health and inner peace, Hilton hotels offer services intended to help guests feel truly rejuvenated.
cleaned_text: It's no secret that vacations can be good for the mind, body and soul. And for travelers wanting to focus on the latter, there are plenty of Hilton hotel services intended to help guests boost their energy and feel truly rejuvenated. For some, that means sunrise yoga on the beach or a peaceful meditation in a stunning natural setting, both services that focus on controlled breathing and quieting the mind for stress relief and inner peace. For others, rejuvenation may come from personalized astrology experiences, ancient cultural folk healing ceremonies and moon-influenced body treatments—each intended to offer a deeper spiritual exploration. Whatever your preference, here are six Hilton properties that aim to help restore and rejuvenate a guest from the inside out. Conrad Maldives Rangali Island - Maldives The [Conrad Maldives Rangali Island](https://www.conradmaldives.com/) is set over a stretch of atolls that make up Rangali Island, surrounded by plenty of clear blue sea. After a day of swimming, sunning and dining, guests can indulge in yoga, as the resort offers a resident yoga instructor with more than a decade of experience and training. Visitors can participate in sunrise sun salutations; group Hatha Yoga and Yoga for Mind & Body classes; book private one-on-one sunset sessions; and more. Indulge in 'Curanderismo,' Moon Massages at Waldorf Astoria Los Cabos Pedregal - Mexico The award-winning spa at the [Waldorf Astoria Los Cabos Pedregal](https://www.waldorfastorialoscabospedregal.com/) offers a menu of services rooted in a form of Mexican folk healing called curanderismo, which uses rituals and herbs for physical and spiritual healing. Both the moon and the sea—and their respective effects on the human body—are honored through a rotation of spa treatments influenced by the lunar cycle. For guests who want to focus more deeply on the self, they can book a monthly Self-Love Wellness Weekend Experience. Inspired by the lunar cycle and natural healing elements of the ocean, the monthly weekends coincide with the New Moon, which symbolizes a time of reflection and renewal. Weekends may include private breathing sessions, mindfulness workshops, and various moon and intention treatments. Dive into Astrology at Grand Wailea, A Waldorf Astoria Resort - Hawaii [Grand Wailea, A Waldorf Astoria Resort](https://www.grandwailea.com/) is embracing a modern, holistic approach to wellness at the property's award-winning Spa Grande. The [Live Grande Reset Package](https://www.grandwailea.com/specialoffers/live-grande-reset-package/) offers à la carte energy treatments, healing arts, metaphysical sessions, mindful nutrition sessions, guided mindfulness sessions and more. The spa also has a resident astrologer on hand to conduct readings and healings based on guests' individual needs. Tune Up Your Energy at Hilton Sedona Resort at Bell Rock - Arizona, U.S. Sedona regularly draws visitors seeking spiritual enrichment at one of Sedona's sacred [vortexes](https://visitsedona.com/spiritual-wellness/what-is-a-vortex/). Visitors can complement their visit at [Hilton Sedona Resort at Bell Rock](https://www.hiltonsedonaresort.com/), where an energy specialist offers a unique range of therapies that focus on channeling positive energy. Guests can choose from tarot card readings and tuning fork therapy, to aura cleansings. Four-legged guests can also get their own therapeutic boost of pet energy through the resort's Pet Pals program. Cleanse Your Mind & Body at a Mexican Temazcal Ritual at Conrad Punta de Mita - Mexico The [spa at Conrad Punta de Mita](https://www.conradpuntademita.com/wellness/spa/) invites guests to indulge in a Mexican temazcal, a cultural and spiritual practice aimed at purification. Guests first receive a cleanse by a shaman, then enter a dome structure for a ritual that involves hot lava rocks, herbal steam paired, chanting and meditation. Participants can top off their relaxation with a swim and refreshments afterward. Enjoy Outdoor Meditation at Waldorf Astoria Maldives Ithaafushi - Maldives At the [Waldorf Astoria Maldives Ithaafushi](https://waldorfastoria3.hilton.com/en/hotels/maldives/waldorf-astoria-maldives-ithaafushi-MLEONWA/index.html), vacationers can take a break from their day of water sports, spa treatments and poolside lounging for some relaxing yoga. Situated in the middle of the glittering Indian Ocean, the resort is situated in an ideal setting for outdoor sunrise yoga, Tai Chi, meditation, sunset yoga in the resort's Ocean Pavilion and more. In addition to enjoying the experiences at these resorts, members of Hilton's guest-loyalty program, Hilton Honors, can receive instant benefits and rewards. Members can choose to pay in a combination of Points & Money, as well as enjoy discounted rates when booking direct through Hilton.com or the Hilton Honors App. Plus, Hilton Honors members can earn even more Points on their next stay when they register for the [More Nights, More Points promotion](https://www.hiltonhonors.com/en_US/hh2-2021-more-nights/landing/) and stay between May 3 - September 6, 2021. Not yet a member? It's free and easy to enroll at HiltonHonors.com, and new members can receive up to 5,000 additional Bonus Points when they sign up through December 31, 2021.
